local aTimer = nil
local aTimerInterval = 1000
local aTimerTicks = 0
local aTimerTickMax = 0
local function aTimer_tick(timer)
   if aTimerTickMax > 0 and aTimerTicks >= aTimerTickMax then
      timer.destroy()
   end
   aTimerTicks = aTimerTicks + 1
   openProcess("RecRoom.exe")
   if b == 0 or b == 255 then
      openProcess("RecRoom.exe")
   end

end

function AOBRep(search, change)
local aob = AOBScan(search)
if aob then
  for i=0,aob.Count-1 do
    autoAssemble(aob[i]..':\ndb '..change)
  end
  aob.Destroy()
end
end

function test()
searchV = '64 00 38 00 36 00 65 00 32 00 65 00 36 00 35 00 2D 00 35 00 64 00 38 00 37 00 2D 00 34 00 36 00 36 00 64 00 2D 00 62 00 38 00 38 00 35 00 2D 00 38 00 63 00 35 00 32 00 61 00 63 00 32 00 65 00 65 00 65 00 62 00 30 00'
replaceV = '32 00 63 00 36 00 37 00 39 00 66 00 38 00 39 00 2D 00 63 00 37 00 36 00 65 00 2D 00 34 00 63 00 66 00 62 00 2D 00 39 00 34 00 65 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 38 00 63 00 38 00 66 00 64 00 34 00 34 00 64 00 35 00 35 00'
AOBRep(searchV,replaceV)
searchV2 = '34 00 61 00 30 00 65 00 39 00 31 00 61 00 31 00 2D 00 34 00 35 00 36 00 32 00 2D 00 34 00 61 00 38 00 32 00 2D 00 39 00 32 00 62 00 65 00 2D 00 63 00 62 00 37 00 34 00 39 00 31 00 66 00 31 00 35 00 39 00 32 00 62 00'
replaceV2 = '32 00 63 00 36 00 37 00 39 00 66 00 38 00 39 00 2D 00 63 00 37 00 36 00 65 00 2D 00 34 00 63 00 66 00 62 00 2D 00 39 00 34 00 65 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 38 00 63 00 38 00 66 00 64 00 34 00 34 00 64 00 35 00 35 00'
AOBRep(searchV2,replaceV2)
searchV3 = '30 00 38 00 64 00 35 00 36 00 36 00 32 00 37 00 2D 00 34 00 35 00 30 00 30 00 2D 00 34 00 37 00 32 00 34 00 2D 00 38 00 36 00 39 00 32 00 2D 00 61 00 32 00 33 00 63 00 39 00 36 00 64 00 64 00 62 00 33 00 65 00 63 00'
replaceV3 = '37 00 65 00 64 00 38 00 31 00 61 00 65 00 61 00 2D 00 30 00 65 00 37 00 37 00 2D 00 34 00 62 00 33 00 38 00 2D 00 61 00 38 00 37 00 63 00 2D 00 37 00 32 00 39 00 30 00 34 00 38 00 63 00 36 00 66 00 65 00 34 00 31 00'
AOBRep(searchV2,replaceV2)
searchV4 = '33 00 30 00 38 00 31 00 37 00 31 00 63 00 33 00 2D 00 63 00 66 00 64 00 31 00 2D 00 34 00 66 00 66 00 32 00 2D 00 38 00 35 00 39 00 33 00 2D 00 38 00 35 00 36 00 65 00 38 00 64 00 65 00 37 00 30 00 37 00 31 00 61 00'
replaceV4 = '34 00 33 00 30 00 38 00 64 00 61 00 30 00 34 00 2D 00 61 00 66 00 38 00 34 00 2D 00 34 00 30 00 62 00 62 00 2D 00 38 00 34 00 35 00 61 00 2D 00 37 00 61 00 39 00 65 00 31 00 61 00 32 00 37 00 32 00 36 00 65 00 63 00'
AOBRep(searchV4,replaceV4)
searchV5 = '32 00 32 00 70 00 79 00 49 00 33 00 4B 00 7A 00 2D 00 55 00 75 00 6C 00 6C 00 68 00 63 00 65 00 62 00 43 00 36 00 44 00 4C 00 51 00'
replaceV5 = '4B 00 4E 00 5A 00 31 00 44 00 76 00 43 00 4C 00 43 00 30 00 57 00 48 00 79 00 48 00 34 00 6F 00 70 00 59 00 41 00 58 00 74 00 77 00'
AOBRep(searchV5,replaceV5)
searchV6 = '36 00 52 00 68 00 77 00 57 00 45 00 78 00 58 00 65 00 6B 00 61 00 59 00 70 00 4B 00 30 00 4E 00 47 00 48 00 53 00 58 00 47 00 51 00'
replaceV6 = '37 00 56 00 51 00 76 00 7A 00 39 00 73 00 62 00 7A 00 55 00 57 00 76 00 47 00 61 00 6C 00 78 00 64 00 39 00 72 00 49 00 53 00 67 00'
AOBRep(searchV6,replaceV6)
searchV7 = '66 00 58 00 4E 00 6B 00 4D 00 57 00 46 00 4D 00 56 00 30 00 61 00 58 00 61 00 6C 00 4B 00 5F 00 79 00 5F 00 38 00 53 00 48 00 77 00 2C 00 48 00 51 00 51 00 57 00 63 00 63 00 64 00 79 00 61 00 6B 00 61 00 45 00 6D 00 6E 00 74 00 50 00 68 00 76 00 43 00 36 00 43 00 51 00'
replaceV7 = '34 00 36 00 66 00 37 00 45 00 77 00 65 00 39 00 39 00 45 00 36 00 74 00 46 00 32 00 71 00 46 00 61 00 4D 00 74 00 51 00 30 00 67 00 2C 00 38 00 49 00 4B 00 31 00 55 00 32 00 33 00 58 00 6C 00 55 00 4F 00 56 00 2D 00 32 00 69 00 62 00 56 00 7A 00 6E 00 6B 00 44 00 51 00'
AOBRep(searchV7,replaceV7)
searchV8 = '35 00 66 00 77 00 6A 00 46 00 51 00 6F 00 43 00 5F 00 55 00 75 00 39 00 43 00 68 00 76 00 46 00 36 00 75 00 4E 00 47 00 5A 00 77 00'
replaceV8 = '73 00 4C 00 37 00 69 00 48 00 43 00 6E 00 6A 00 79 00 45 00 75 00 51 00 4B 00 7A 00 72 00 54 00 76 00 63 00 69 00 45 00 7A 00 51 00'
AOBRep(searchV8,replaceV8)
searchV9 = '66 00 58 00 4E 00 6B 00 4D 00 57 00 46 00 4D 00 56 00 30 00 61 00 58 00 61 00 6C 00 4B 00 5F 00 79 00 5F 00 38 00 53 00 48 00 77 00 2C 00 53 00 53 00 59 00 38 00 5A 00 59 00 4D 00 67 00 61 00 45 00 32 00 42 00 6C 00 34 00 6F 00 46 00 6D 00 4D 00 6A 00 4B 00 51 00 41 00'
replaceV9 = '34 00 36 00 66 00 37 00 45 00 77 00 65 00 39 00 39 00 45 00 36 00 74 00 46 00 32 00 71 00 46 00 61 00 4D 00 74 00 51 00 30 00 67 00 2C 00 38 00 49 00 4B 00 31 00 55 00 32 00 33 00 58 00 6C 00 55 00 4F 00 56 00 2D 00 32 00 69 00 62 00 56 00 7A 00 6E 00 6B 00 44 00 51 00'
AOBRep(searchV9,replaceV9)
searchA = '49 00 51 00 4D 00 4F 00 36 00 45 00 35 00 6F 00 66 00 6B 00 79 00 43 00 33 00 53 00 2D 00 49 00 67 00 72 00 4B 00 79 00 49 00 77 00'
replaceA = '34 00 6C 00 77 00 46 00 30 00 30 00 52 00 76 00 62 00 30 00 4B 00 72 00 33 00 46 00 4A 00 7A 00 30 00 37 00 48 00 6C 00 4F 00 51 00'
AOBRep(searchA,replaceA)
searchA1 = '6E 00 37 00 34 00 31 00 76 00 4B 00 6A 00 30 00 32 00 6B 00 79 00 74 00 38 00 42 00 35 00 66 00 54 00 36 00 73 00 32 00 6F 00 67 00'
replaceA1 = '6E 00 38 00 74 00 30 00 67 00 49 00 59 00 46 00 62 00 55 00 61 00 50 00 4D 00 68 00 79 00 51 00 65 00 57 00 6B 00 50 00 53 00 51 00'
AOBRep(searchA1,replaceA1)
searchA2 = '69 00 44 00 6E 00 69 00 6A 00 33 00 56 00 61 00 45 00 6B 00 53 00 41 00 6E 00 70 00 74 00 35 00 51 00 52 00 65 00 76 00 69 00 67 00'
replaceA2 = '70 00 70 00 48 00 38 00 6D 00 69 00 45 00 33 00 39 00 6B 00 47 00 61 00 53 00 75 00 41 00 43 00 51 00 76 00 33 00 34 00 57 00 41 00'
AOBRep(searchA2,replaceA2)
searchA3 = '6F 00 43 00 42 00 31 00 5A 00 65 00 54 00 30 00 68 00 55 00 36 00 75 00 51 00 47 00 68 00 48 00 4E 00 73 00 45 00 76 00 6B 00 67 00'
replaceA3 = '38 00 6B 00 33 00 71 00 5F 00 31 00 64 00 5F 00 2D 00 6B 00 53 00 42 00 7A 00 4E 00 4C 00 43 00 6C 00 31 00 48 00 51 00 68 00 77 00'
AOBRep(searchA3,replaceA3)
searchC = '30 00 6D 00 77 00 74 00 76 00 52 00 70 00 6B 00 6D 00 45 00 43 00 61 00 54 00 35 00 5F 00 34 00 61 00 71 00 43 00 74 00 74 00 51 00'
replaceC = '34 00 6C 00 77 00 46 00 30 00 30 00 52 00 76 00 62 00 30 00 4B 00 72 00 33 00 46 00 4A 00 7A 00 30 00 37 00 48 00 6C 00 4F 00 51 00'
AOBRep(searchC,replaceC)
searchC1 = '76 00 70 00 78 00 42 00 6B 00 59 00 76 00 36 00 4C 00 55 00 53 00 56 00 56 00 34 00 4E 00 68 00 59 00 41 00 53 00 31 00 46 00 77 00'
replaceC1 = '6E 00 38 00 74 00 30 00 67 00 49 00 59 00 46 00 62 00 55 00 61 00 50 00 4D 00 68 00 79 00 51 00 65 00 57 00 6B 00 50 00 53 00 51 00'
AOBRep(searchC1,replaceC1)
searchC2 = '53 00 37 00 43 00 32 00 41 00 38 00 6E 00 67 00 61 00 30 00 53 00 6C 00 49 00 65 00 4F 00 45 00 6B 00 65 00 59 00 61 00 55 00 77 00'
replaceC2 = '70 00 70 00 48 00 38 00 6D 00 69 00 45 00 33 00 39 00 6B 00 47 00 61 00 53 00 75 00 41 00 43 00 51 00 76 00 33 00 34 00 57 00 41 00'
AOBRep(searchC2,replaceC2)
searchC3 = '53 00 6B 00 69 00 20 00 42 00 75 00 64 00 64 00 79 00'
replaceC3 = '31 00 31 00 31 00 20 00 31 00 31 00 31 00 31 00 31 00'
AOBRep(searchC3,replaceC3)
end

MyForm = createForm(true)
MyForm.Width = 200
MyForm.Height = 200

shbf = createButton(MyForm)
shbf.Left = 10
shbf.Top = 35
shbf.Width = 125
shbf.Height = 40
shbf.onClick = test
shbf.Caption = 'HEXXED ADDON V1'

aTimer = createTimer(MainForm, false)
aTimer.Interval = aTimerInterval
aTimer.OnTimer = aTimer_tick
aTimer.Enabled = true
